name: Emo Dress Up game
description:
Just let your imagination free and create perfect scene girl.
Dress up 3 different cute and stylish emo girls and complete emo look with fancy accessories.
Emo girl are not common ladies. They hate ordinary style and mass style clothes. More of the Emo hates the rules in fashion styles. Their wardrobe is mind-blow. When emo go out with the best friend this should be something extraordinary.
This is unique opportunity to try to be in the role of Emo girl.
